title: India and IEA deepen partnership on energy security and clean energy
lead: India’s demand for energy is set to grow rapidly in the coming decades, with electricity use set to increase particularly fast

title: Green Network Energy and Simplicity Energy go bust
lead: The closures are forecast to affect around 410,000 domestic customers

title: EU supercharges battery tech research by €2.9bn
lead: The scheme will support technological breakthroughs for entire battery ecosystem

title: Government backs ‘world’s first’ electric hub for flying cars
lead: The first ‘Air Port’ in Coventry will be used for electric vertical take-off and landing aircraft, including cargo drones and air taxis

title: Biden to set moratorium on new oil and gas leases
lead: The new executive order will end new oil and natural gas leases on public lands or offshore waters

title: Can you dig it? Environmental activists tunnel 100ft under London park to protest HS2
lead: The protesters have worked around the clock in shifts of up to 12 people at a time to dig the tunnel

title: UN and UK launch mission to clear up space junk
lead: Space debris can be a hazard to active satellites and spacecraft

title: Anglian Water spends £300m to clean up rivers
lead: The initiative aims to reduce the amount of phosphorus that enters the environment through water sources

title: OVO Energy launches EV tariff that’s ‘63%’ cheaper
lead: Drivers to pay 6p per kilowatt-hour no matter what time of day they charge an EV

title: New consultation on improving management of industrial emissions
lead: The UK aims to develop a tailored regime for better protecting the environment and public health from industrial pollution following Brexit
